---
title: Data sets
output:
  html_document:
    template: template.html
    self_contained: false
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(stringr)
md <- list.files(pattern='*.md', recursive=TRUE) |>
  str_subset('^bin/', negate=TRUE) |>
  str_subset('^index/', negate=TRUE) |>
  str_subset('readme.md', negate=TRUE) |>
  str_extract('.*/(.*)\\.md', 1)
tab <- data.frame(
  Name = md,
  Desc = 'placeholder',
  Download = '<i class="bi-cloud-download" style="color: #FFCD00;"></i>',
  Info = str_glue('<a href="{md}.html"><i class="bi-file-text" style="color: #FFCD00;"></i></a>')
)
knitr::kable(
  tab,
  table.attr = "class=\"table table-dark table-striped\"",
  format = "html",
  escape = FALSE,
  align = c('l', 'l', 'c', 'c'))
```
